description: This module fails the progress with a custom message. It can be useful for bailing out when a certain condition is met using only_if.

examples.code:
action: fail msg="The system may not be provisioned according to the CMDB status." rc=100
only_if: "'$cmdb_status' != 'to-be-staged'"
examples.description: Example playbook using fail and only_if together

author: Dag Wieers

description: The customized message used for failing execution. If ommited, fail will simple bail out with a generic message.
The return code of the failure. This is currently not used by Ansible, but might be used in the future.
